Package ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.engine

Class SEScriptException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • javax.script.ScriptException
          • ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.plugins.engine.SEScriptException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class SEScriptException
extends javax.script.ScriptException
    The exception class that wraps all exceptions thrown by the underlying script engine(s). Unlike the base ScriptException, allows a cause to be specified along with a file position.
    Author:
    Chris Jennings
    See Also:
